description[0]_en: A distinct intellectual or artistic creation, that is, the intellectual or artistic content.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A distinct intellectual or artistic creation, that is, the intellectual or artistic content.

description[0]_en: An entity who is capable of deliberate actions, of being granted rights, and of being held accountable for its actions.
note[0]_en: An agent includes a collective agent and a person.
ToolkitDefinition_en: An entity who is capable of deliberate actions, of being granted rights, and of being held accountable for its actions.

description[0]_en: A single exemplar or instance of a manifestation.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A single exemplar or instance of a manifestation.

description[0]_en: An agent who is an individual human being who lives or is assumed to have lived.
ToolkitDefinition_en: An agent who is an individual human being who lives or is assumed to have lived.

description[0]_en: A collective agent who is composed of persons who are organized for a common purpose or activity.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A collective agent who is composed of persons who are organized for a common purpose or activity.

description[0]_en: An intellectual or artistic realization of a work in the form of alpha-numeric, musical or choreographic notation, sound, image, object, movement, etc., or any combination of such forms.
ToolkitDefinition_en: An intellectual or artistic realization of a work in the form of alpha-numeric, musical or choreographic notation, sound, image, object, movement, etc., or any combination of such forms.

description[0]_en: A physical embodiment of an expression of a work.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A physical embodiment of an expression of a work.

description[0]_en: A collective agent who is composed of persons who are related by birth, marriage, adoption, civil union, or similar legal status, or who otherwise present themselves as a family.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A collective agent who is composed of persons who are related by birth, marriage, adoption, civil union, or similar legal status, or who otherwise present themselves as a family.

description[0]_en: An agent who is a gathering or organization of two or more persons that bears a particular name and that is capable of acting as a unit.
note[0]_en: A collective agent includes a corporate body and a family.
ToolkitDefinition_en: An agent who is a gathering or organization of two or more persons that bears a particular name and that is capable of acting as a unit.

description[0]_en: A label for any RDA entity except a nomen
note[0]_en: A label includes a name, title, access point, or identifier.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A label for any RDA entity except a nomen

description[0]_en: An abstract class of key conceptual objects in the universe of human discourse that are a focus of interest to users of RDA metadata in a system for resource discovery.
note[0]_en: An RDA entity includes an agent, collective agent, corporate body, expression, family, item, manifestation, nomen, person, place, timespan, and work.
ToolkitDefinition_en: An abstract class of key conceptual objects in the universe of human discourse that are a focus of interest to users of RDA metadata in a system for resource discovery.
